abstract.p: Latest clutches noted; photo (Pulse column: Handbag Special) (S)

block.p: With fitted suits, pumps and pearls, this is a season of Park Avenue chic, and the handbag is its centerpiece. The new crop comes in ultraclassic shapes and sizes, from doctor bags to whisper-thin clutches, in luxe crocodile, pampered-prep tweeds and the two-tone shades of a vintage Rolls-Royce. The X factor is quiet opulence.

SHOW STEALERS Harking back to the era when greed was good, and the Chanel bag was all, refined flash defines the season's hottest pocketbooks. Celine's fake-crocodile embossed leather ($750) and Gucci's beige ostrich with tiger buckle ($1,295) boast lots of hardware. Exotic skins like ring lizard are replacing python. ''We've gone beyond your basic skins to karung -- a water snake -- and toad skin,'' said Michelle Kessler of Vogue. ''The more exotic, the better.'' Later, alligator.
